genresAdvancedInfo.name: rwandan hip hop
genresAdvancedInfo.description: Rwandan hip hop is a growing genre that combines traditional African music with modern rap beats and lyrics. The music often addresses social and political issues, giving voice to the struggles and aspirations of the Rwandan people. The use of Kinyarwanda, the local language, adds an authentic and personal touch to the music.

index.head-title: Spotify Top artists and songs - Stats about your music on Spotify

index.what-is-spotify-top-content: The {strongOpen}easiest{strongClose} way to get stats about your listening history on Spotify. Find out and share your {strongOpen}top artists{strongClose}, {strongOpen}tracks{strongClose}, and {strongOpen}genres{strongClose}.
